name: Word & Reading Time Counter
author: Md Rashed Hossain

sections.description:
If you are a blogger or writer and using WordPress as your website CMS, then WP Word & Reading Time Counter plugin is for you. It will tells you exactly how many words youâ€™ve written on your site and how long it will take to read. Reading Time options will shows the estimated reading time of the post, in seconds or minutes.

Features:

  • Post Word Count
  • Post Reading Time
  • Easy to Configure
  • Easy to use
  • Compitable with Latest version

N.B: If you want more options in this simpel plugin, please contact with me
sections.installation:
Installing ‘Word & Reading Time Counter’ plugin is easy as like dirinking tea at home. ðŸ™‚ Just follow these simple steps:

  1. Go to Add new Plugin from your WordPress admin and search for: Word & Reading Time Counter
  2. Click on install and activate after successfully installed.
  3. Thats it.

short_description: Show your reader how much time they need to read and how many words in a post.
